about_the_game:
Witches Craft (formerly named The Alchemist) is an adult adventure & crafting game following Selene; A fully trained Hedge Witch and Aspiring Alchemist.

Of course Selene still needs to earn enough to pay the rent so will need to continue her work as a hedge witch for the locals, whilst also increasing her knowledge of potion making by exploring the local area, finding new items and ingredients for her potions and elixirs.



The game features open world game play allowing you to gradually explore and unlock more areas of the game as you progress, finding new items for your potions, crafting potions and magical items, performing work for the locals and passing adventurers to earn money to pay for house expansion and the seasonal rent.



The game also offers multiple different stories to follow, will you look to become a master alchemist and turn your back on your training as a witch, or will you commune with nature and locate the Gaia tree as many before you have done, or instead perhaps you will fall in love in town and make your home there permanently, these and a variety of other options are available to you plus lots of saucy adult content as you get to know the many people of the town.
